scripts.start-local: set NODE_ENV=dev&& set DB_USER=devuser&& set DB_PASSWORD=testing123!&& set DB_HOST=127.0.0.1&& set DB_NAME=quiz_app&& node .
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run build-ts
scripts.watch: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Sass,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run watch-node"
scripts.debug: set NODE_ENV=dev && npm run build && node --inspect dist/server.js
scripts.watch-debug: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Sass,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run serve-debug"
